comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Boeing SA-307B Stratoliner NC19908 c/n 2000 TWA '403', later USAAF C-75 42-88626, then NC19908 again, F-BELY, XW-PGR.

This Stratoliner was impressed into USAAF service in 1942.  "....Returned to TWA in July 1944 and rebuilt as SA-307B-1 N19908. Sold to French Aigle Azur Transports Aeriens in July 1951 as F-BELY.  Sold Air Laous in 1952, to Airnautic Nov 1959.  To Air Laos as XW-PGR Apr 1970.  Operated by Royal Air Lao as XW-PGR.  Damaged on ground Feb 27, 1971 and sat derelict at Luang Prabang for several years.  Sold to Cambodia Air Commercial in 1974.  Believed to have been damaged in collision with C-47 Apr 20, 1971 at Luang Prabang and cut up for scrap." - J. Baugher
